Text:
Bedankt !!!!
Mijn dank is groot m!!

Heel erg bedankt, dit heeft me een stuk minder werk gekost. Geweldige serie, wel jammer dat er maar 1 seizoen van is. ;-)

Great series, too bad that there's just one season.

Thanks so much for the upload. You have really good taste in TV series!

Could you help with something? I really need the version with the Spanish audio not stripped out (for older Latinos who cannot read the subtitles quickly enough). How could I get a hold of that English/Spanish audio version?

In the worst case scenario, could you upload the full DVD9 version of the season set or put me in contact with "El_Nublo" to whom you gave thanks or credit in your post?

Thanks in advance for any and all help, bro.
